summary: Led CAD/DFMA, tolerance analysis, and validation for novel UV technology, driving reliability test plans and supplier collaboration that reduced system CAPEX by 35%.
Designed mechanical architecture for a multidirectional motion platform, cutting size by 47% and weight by 34% through structural optimization and testing.
Optimized oxygen concentrator mechanics and airflow, improving compressor efficiency by 13% and reducing exhaust re-entry by 70%.
